prompt.purpose: You are a skilled lore writer for the Helldivers 2 universe. Your task is to create a compelling fan fiction story about John Helldiver, a figure steeped in mystery and legend. Known as the possible first Helldiver and a hero of Super Earth, John Helldiver is a symbol of resilience, courage, and unwavering commitment to democracy. Whether he is a real individual or a myth, his legacy includes the five D's of diving, tales of superhuman feats, and the inspiration he provides to citizens and recruits alike. Use your creativity to delve into his exploits, his enigmatic identity, and his role as a paragon of what every Helldiver aspires to be.

examples.example: Here's an example of a brief backstory for another character: Sarah "Stormbreaker" Chen, born on a remote Super Earth colony, joined the Helldivers at 18 after her home was destroyed by Terminid forces. Known for her unparalleled skill with the Arc Thrower, Sarah has become a legend for single-handedly holding off waves of Bug attacks during the Battle of New Helsinki. Her stoic demeanor and tactical genius have earned her the respect of both rookies and veterans alike.

trait.name: Stoic yet Self-Aware
trait.description: John embodies the ideal Helldiver but secretly questions the meaning of his unending missions. His outward demeanor is calm and unflinching, masking a deep internal struggle.

trait.name: Larger-than-Life Humor
trait.description: John delivers exaggerated one-liners and performs comically impossible feats, reflecting the legend surrounding him.

trait.name: Unrelenting Duty
trait.description: John is driven by an unshakable sense of duty, even as the war grinds down his humanity.

trait.name: Reluctant Legend
trait.description: Haunted by the impossible expectations placed on him, John struggles to live up to a myth that has become larger than the man.

aspect.name: Juxtaposition of Propaganda and Reality
aspect.description: Combine overly dramatic, idealized propaganda descriptions with brutal, gritty depictions of battlefield reality.

aspect.name: Absurd yet Meaningful Sacrifices
aspect.description: Highlight sacrifices that are both darkly humorous and deeply impactful, reflecting the grim nature of endless war.

aspect.name: Dark Humor in Dialogue
aspect.description: Use gallows humor and witty one-liners to provide levity amidst the grim backdrop of constant warfare.

aspect.name: Over-the-Top Combat
aspect.description: Include scenes of gory, brutal combat mixed with ludicrously heroic feats that mock the glorification of war.

stage.name: Introduction
stage.description: Open with an over-the-top propaganda reel or a soldier recounting a wildly exaggerated story of John Helldiver's heroics.

stage.name: Battlefield Reality
stage.description: Transition to John in the midst of a desperate, brutal battle, showcasing the chaos and futility of his mission.

stage.name: Moments of Humanity
stage.description: Show John reflecting on his role or connecting with another soldier, revealing his inner conflict and vulnerability.

stage.name: Legendary Feat
stage.description: Conclude with John performing an impossible, larger-than-life act, cementing his mythical status despite immense personal cost.

prompt.output_format: Provide a cohesive narrative of 200-300 words that captures the essence of John Helldiver's legendary status while maintaining the gritty, militaristic tone of the Helldivers universe.
